name: Classroom Clash
description:
Welcome to 'Classroom Clash' - the WIP low poly 3D fighting game where the teachers of ESAD battle it out next to their beloved institution.

Choose your favorite educator and unleash your inner warrior as you fight to be the last one standing in this hilarious and action-packed brawl.

With recognizable characters and a familiar setting, 'Classroom Clash' will have you laughing and fighting your way through the school surroundings, so grab your books and get ready to rumble - class is in session!

CREDITS:

Development Team

Unity and Code: HomeGameCoder (Rui Caldas)

Animations: Michaela Gripenstam, Raquel Gouveia

Ilustrations: Beatriz Canêdo

Modeling: Luís Cerdeira, Raquel Gouveia, Sérgio Faria

Music: Tiago Tavares, Tomas Totorius

The Character (As in the character selection scene)

Sérgio Correia, Elias Marques, Carlos Amaral, Bruno Mesquita, João Tiago, João Cruz, Emílio Remelhe, Rui Caldas, Eliana Penedos
